sentence.Network_en: Hydrogen is used extensively in industry for the production of ammonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 氢气在工业上广泛用于制氨。

sentence.Network_en: Mark, however, needs to travel extensively with his varied business interests.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而，马克因为各种生意需要频繁出差。

sentence.Network_en: All these issues have been extensively researched in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 近年来，对所有这些问题都作了全面研究。

list.abs: 叫扩展(extensions)比较合适，插件(plugins)虽然也属于外挂(Add-ons)，但是和扩展有差别。 目前我只装了5个扩展：Firebug, Web De…
分字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 分会〖 branchassociation〗 分机〖 extension〗 分级〖 classify;grade〗.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... extension n 延展，扩张；延期 extensive a 广泛的，广阔的 extent n 范围；程度.

entry.def: Something that is extensive covers or includes a large physical area.

example.ex: When built, the palace and its grounds were more extensive than the city itself.
example.tran: 建成时，宫殿及其庭园比城市本身面积还要大。

entry.tran: 广泛的;全面的;包罗万象的
entry.def: Something that is extensive covers a wide range of details, ideas, or items.

example.ex: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph...
example.tran: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

example.ex: ...the extensive research into public attitudes to science...
example.tran: 针对公众科学观的广泛调查

entry.def: If something is extensive, it is very great.

example.ex: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows...
example.tran: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

example.ex: The security forces have extensive powers of search and arrest...
example.tran: 安全部队拥有搜查和逮捕的至高权力。

sentences.sentence: "oxidation ponds are extensively used for sewage treatment in the Midwest"

auth_sentence.content: The controversy has been covered extensively in the blogosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content: The controversy has been covered extensively in the blogosphere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The controversy has been covered extensively in the blogosphere.

auth_sentence.content: Chlorine is presently being used extensively throughout the country.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chlorine is presently being used extensively throughout the country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chlorine is presently being used extensively throughout the country.

auth_sentence.content: Game theory is used extensively to support evolutionary psychology.
auth_sentence.res_content: Game theory is used extensively to support evolutionary psychology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Game theory is used extensively to support evolutionary psychology.

Sentence.sentence: The board of judges questioned Wheatley extensively and ruled that she was educated enough to have written the book.

sentences.en: The interior has recently been extensively restored.
sentences.cn: 室内最近大规模地整修过。

sentences.en: He has written extensively on the subject.
sentences.cn: 就这一题目他已经写了大量的东西。

sentences.en: She quotes extensively from the author’s diaries.
sentences.cn: 她大量引用作者日记中的语句。

sentences.en: Corn and cotton are extensively cultivated in this region.
sentences.cn: 这个地区普遍种植玉米和蔬菜。

sentences.en: Around here apple trees began to be planted extensively in 1953.
sentences.cn: 1953年这一带开始大规模种植苹果树。

sentences.en: She has toured extensively in the US.
sentences.cn: 她在美国玩了很多地方。

sentences.en: Of all these verbs the verb is the most extensively used.
sentences.cn: 在这些动词中应用范围最广的是这个动词。
